description: The count of point locations at which measurements or samples were taken.
label: number of stations

description: The period of time expressed in calendar days (86400 seconds) during which the measurement or sampling is continuously taking place.
label: activity duration in days

description: The period of time expressed in hours (3600 seconds) during which the measurement or sampling is continuously taking place.
label: activity duration in hours

description: The distance in kilometres covered by the platform during which the measurement or sampling is continuously taking place.
label: track kilometres

description: The count of the deployments of sampling devices that collect biological samples including plankton nets, trawls, sledges and dredges.,
label: number of hauls

description: The count of discrete material collections of air, water, sediment, rock or biota obtained for subsequent measurement.
label: number of samples

description: Sets of vertically distributed measurements or sample collections at a fixed location.
label: number of profiles

description: The count of whole cylindrical samples of rocks or mud collected that contain material from varying depths below the seabed.
label: number of cores

description: The count of determinations of the size or magnitude of something.
label: number of measurements

description: The period of time expressed in calendar months during which the measurement or sampling is continuously taking place.
label: activity months

description: The count of discrete periods of time during which something is measured or watched.
label: number of observations

description: The count of journeys from surface to depth and back again by subsurface platforms deployed from the cruise, including ROVs, AUVs and human divers.,
label: number of dives

description: The count of sample processing and measurement procedures undertaken, such as incubation or settling velocity experiments.,,
label: number of experiments

description: The count of standard containers filled with fish.  Each basket is roughly equal to a 45kg sample weight.
label: sample baskets

description: The mass expressed in kilograms of samples obtained.
label: sample kilograms

description: The volume expressed in litres of samples obtained.
label: sample litres

description: The volume of information accumulated on a computer resulting from the measurement expressed in gigabytes (1048576 8-bit bytes).
label: data volume in gigabytes

description: The count of image collections such as films, video tapes and digital video files.,,
label: number of image series

description: The count of discrete images such as photographs or digital image files.
label: number of images

description: The count of individual organisms obtained.
label: number of specimens

description: The count of different taxonomic groups capable of interbreeding obtained.
label: number of species

description: The count of discrete subsets of the platform path during which a specified set of measurements or observations were made
label: number of track lines

description: The area, usually of seabed, surveyed during the cruise expressed in square kilometres.,
label: survey square kilometres

description: The count of discrete areas of seabed or discrete volumes of the water column in which measurements or observations were made.
label: number of surveys

description: The count of the times a piece of equipment was deposited into the sea or atmosphere for recovery during the cruise, by a subsequent cruise or possibly never.,,
label: number of deployments

description: The count of the times a piece of equipment deposited into the sea or atmosphere by a previous cruise was recovered.
label: number of recoveries

description: The count of aircraft activities such as overflights associated with a cruise.
label: number of flights
